content: Policies CPF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 24 Oct 2018Will our CPF Life payout ever be depleted before we kick the bucket?I dead from the CPF website that we will get payouts from CPF Life until we die, but I saw a seedly post this morning stating we will deplete all our CPF Life savings in around 2 decades at most. So which is true? I'm confused.2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Good Day Every DayLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Not true. 
CPF Life is an annuity scheme that provides you with a monthly payout for life, so you wonâ€™t have to worry about outliving your savings.
https://www.areyouready.sg/YourInfoHub/Pages/News-How-Much-Will-I-Receive-in-Monthly-CPF-LIFE-Payouts.aspx1 comment1
Question Poster25 Oct 2018Thanks for your answer. Now I'm really wondering the facts on the rest of the seedly blog posts!

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019When you deplete and still alive, you will still get monthly payout but you wont have any cpf for your family.2 comments1

Question Poster25 Oct 2018Thanks for your answer. Seems that the orginal article was taken off seedly. I felt quite misled by it, and I was wondering if the facts were accurate and was it posted without facts verification? Thanks again!Nicholes Wong25 Oct 2018I think it was talking about no more cpf for family. Facts were accurate but most people got confused because the title was abit misleading
